comments.content:
You might start by scanning down the list of thread titles. I believe this was covered very recently in another thread.

-=®=-

Well.. climb the hill towards Hangman's Ridge, avoiding any mountain lions. When you reach an old barn, go around back and ask for Charlie. Tell Charlie the dancing stones are restless. He will give you his van. Take Charlies van down the old mine road, but do not wake the straw man. Turn left on Comstock. When you feel the blood in your veins run cold get out of the van. Up the ridge there is a book outlining all the details of font design but it guarded by a Spectral Wolf.

The Spectral Wolf fears only fire.

Good luck.

Haley, Haley, Haley... You're gonna loose your type designer de-coder ring givin' away secrets like that.

Oh,.... No wonder my first fonts were so crummy. I turned RIGHT on Comstock. Derr!
